member.name: T:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox
member.summary: TextBox control that automatically suggests matching items when the user types.

member.name: T:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListBase
member.summary: Base control for a data bound list with Ajax Output properties.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListBase.Items
member.summary: Gets the collection of items in the list.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListBase.ItemDelimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the character that delimits entries in the AJAX output.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListBase.DataValueField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field in the data source which provides the item value.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListBase.DataTextFormatString
member.summary: Gets or sets the formatting applied to the text field. For example, {0:d}.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListBase.DataTextField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field in the data source which provides the item text.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListBase.TextValueDelimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the character that delimits text and values in the AJAX output.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.AjaxUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the Url to retrieve the suggestions from.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameters to pass to the Ajax page querystring.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text value for the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.SelectedText
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected text for the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.SelectedValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected value for the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.SelectedIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected index for the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.ScriptPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the autosuggest javascript file used by the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.ClientItemSelectedCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets the client javascript callback function to execute when the user selects an item from the suggestion list.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.DownImagePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the down arrow image file used by the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.DownHoverImagePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the down arrow hover image file used by the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.UpImagePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the up arrow image file used by the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.UpHoverImagePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the up arrow hover image file used by the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.DropDownImagePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the drop-down image file used by the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.DropDownHoverImagePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the drop-down hover image file used by the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.DropDownPressedImagePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the drop-down pressed image file used by the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.MultiSelectDelimiter1
member.summary: Gets or sets the first delimiter for multiple autocomplete entries. Set both to blank for single autocomplete.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.MultiSelectDelimiter2
member.summary: Gets or sets the second delimiter for multiple autocomplete entries. Set both to blank for single autocomplete.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.TimeOut
member.summary: Gets or sets the autocomplete timeout, in milliseconds (0: autocomplete never times out).

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.ResponseTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time, in milliseconds, between the last char typed and the actual query.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.EntryLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of entries autocomplete will show at a time.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.StartCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of characters needed to be typed before suggestions are shown (effective if > 1).

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.LimitStart
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the autocomplete should be limited to the beginning of keyword.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.MatchFirst
member.summary: Ø°

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.RestrictTyping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control should restrict to existing members of array.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.FullRefresh
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the script should re-send the AJAX request after each typed character.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.UseIFrame
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control should use an IFrame element to fix suggestion list positioning (MS IE only).

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.UseScroll
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control should use a scroll bar (true) or a up/down arrow-buttons (false).

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.UseMouse
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether mouse support should be enabled for the control.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.NoDefault
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control should omit selecting the first item in a suggestion list.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.UseDropDownButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control should display a drop-down button. Changing this property will automatically change the FillVisible, FilterSuggestions, and ReadOnly properties for the control to behave like a drop-down list or a text box but the properties can also be changed independently after changing this property to mix behaviors.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.FilterSuggestions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the suggestions are filtered based on the value input.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.ReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the text input is to be read-only but still allow suggestion selection.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.FillVisibile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the suggestion list is to be visible while the script is filling the list.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.ItemBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the suggestion list.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.ArrowBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the arrow rows (used if UseScroll is false).

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.ItemForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the text color for the non-selected suggestions.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.SelectedItemForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the text color for the selected suggestion.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.SelectedItemBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the selected item in the suggestion list.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.ItemFontNames
member.summary: Gets or sets the font(s) of suggestion items.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestTextBox.ItemFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of suggestion items.

member.name: T:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListPage
member.summary: Base page for outputting lists for autosuggest controls. Requires a linked aspx file with an AutoSuggestList control added with ID of AutoSuggestList (Included in template).

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListPage.TextValueDelimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the character that delimits text and values in the AJAX output.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListPage.ItemDelimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the character that delimits entries in the AJAX output.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListPage.Items
member.summary: Gets the collection of items in the list.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListPage.DataSourceID
member.summary: Gets or sets the control ID of an IDataSource that will be used as the data source.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListPage.DataMember
member.summary: Gets or sets the table or view used for binding against.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListPage.DataTextField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field in the data source which provides the item text.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListPage.DataTextFormatString
member.summary: Gets or sets the formatting applied to the text field. For example, {0:d}.

member.name: P:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestListPage.DataValueField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field in the data source which provides the item value.

member.name: T:AutoSuggest.AutoSuggestList
member.summary: Control for configuring an AutoSuggestListPage in the designer.
